item.title: Valentine's Day Gift Idea: Marimo Moss Ball (Basic Introduction, Care Instructions, and Symbolic Meaning)
item.description: The Marimo moss ball is truly a plant for lazy people. It’s easy to care for, extremely therapeutic mentally, and has symbolic significance.
